text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock @BorisJohnson According to guidelines drawn up in Covid-19 Hospital Discharge Service Requirements 19th March 2020 insists that patients meeting revised clinical criteria will be discharged within hours to make room for Covid 19 patients. Is this what is balancing the books?
